column5: Our comfortable quiet lake home offers a relaxing stay less than 50 paces from the water. It offers parking for 2 vehicles, one queen bed, a couch bed and a queen air mattress. Washer/dryer in home. Firepit/grill and dining area outside. Paddleboard available. We have well water with an occasional odor. Home runs on septic system. TV, DVD player and some movies. Dollar general, amazing BBQ and grocery store on the way. One mile from County Park. Pets encouraged.
